Estas Regras da Comunidade (\"Regras\"): These Community Rules ("Rules") govern general user-related issues related to the services we provide. For clarity, the capitalized terms used in these Rules are defined in the Terms of Service and General Conditions of Use ("Terms").
Por favor, leia estas Regras cuidadosame: Please read these Rules carefully as they constitute a binding legal agreement between you, an online poker player ("Player"), and us, Suprema Poker.
Você concorda que estas Regras regem o s: You agree that these Rules govern your use of our Services and are incorporated into the Terms and Conditions. In case of any conflict between these Rules and the Terms and Conditions, the Terms and Conditions will prevail. If you violate these Rules, we may take action against you or your account in accordance with these Rules or the Terms and Conditions, including, but not limited to, the immediate termination of your account with us. Matters not specifically mentioned in these Rules will be dealt with in accordance with the Terms and Conditions and their respective justifications.

1.1. A LIGA SUPREMA POKER vai sempre con: 1.1. The SUPREMA POKER UNION will always consider the best interests for the practice of the game, and impartiality will always be a priority in every decision-making process.
1.2 Todos os torneios começarão automati: 1.2 All tournaments will automatically begin at the scheduled time on the calendar, as displayed in the Tournament Lobby. We reserve the right to delay or cancel a tournament without prior notice.
1.3. Informações importantes sobre cada: 1.3. Important information about each tournament, including blind structure, round duration, rebuy, add-on, and break information, can be found in the Tournament Lobby. We reserve the right to change the parameters of any tournament at any time without prior notice.
1.4. Os lugares são distribuídos randomi: 1.4. Seats are randomly assigned. Seat changes will not be allowed.
1.5. A premiação será distribuída como i: 1.5. Prizes will be distributed as indicated in the Tournament Lobby, except when an agreement is reached, or the tournament is canceled. The prize structure will not be finalized until registration is closed, and the rebuy and/or add-on period has ended.
1.6. Para se qualificar à realização de: 1.6. To qualify for a rebuy in a tournament with rebuy, the player must have sufficient funds available in their account. Resources committed to other games will not be considered available.
1.7. Será permitido o registro tardio em: 1.7. Late registration will be allowed in all tournaments. The late registration period may vary but will always be indicated in the Tournament Lobby. For example, if a tournament starts at 9:00 AM and has a late registration window of 5 blind levels, with blinds lasting 10 minutes each, registration will close at 9:50 AM.
1.8. Informamos que quando um jogador ut: 1.8. Please be advised that when a player uses more than one account in the same event, a situation we do not recommend or endorse, the player does so at their own risk. Such actions may result in penalties, including a warning, tournament disqualification, partial or total confiscation of winnings, and exclusion from the platform.
1.8.1. Os jogadores que se registrarem c: 1.8.1. Players registering with more than one account in the same event must adhere to behaviors that do not violate fair play rules.
l. Jogar com apenas uma conta por mão, e: l. Play with only one account per hand, avoiding gaining undue advantage; otherwise, the situation will be deemed collusion.
ll. Não realizar chip dumping entre as c: ll. Do not engage in chip dumping between accounts (intentional loss of chips to another player).
lll. Não trocar informações com outros j: lll. Do not exchange information with other players about your cards via phone/chat programs; such a situation will be considered collusion.
1.8.2. A equipe de Operação do Suprema P: 1.8.2. The Suprema Poker Operations team monitors and reviews all events, ensuring that everyone enjoys a healthy, fair, and exciting poker game, discouraging dishonest behavior that violates Fair Play rules. Identified players will be subject to penalties.
1.9. A escolha do nickname e da foto do: 1.9. The choice of nickname and avatar photo must not infringe on intellectual property, privacy, or any other rights of third parties. Nicknames such as "liga supremapoker," "supremapoker," "liga suprema," or any name of a union-participating club will not be accepted, and the account may be subject to exclusion from the SUPREMA POKER UNION.
1.10. A LIGA SUPREMA POKER poderá solici: 1.10. The SUPREMA POKER UNION may request personal identification documents from players at any time to verify their legal age. The SUPREMA POKER UNION may temporarily or permanently suspend, at its sole discretion, the account of a player who refuses to submit the required documents and will delete the account of a player who is proven to be underage.
1.11. Em todos os torneios será possível: 1.11. In all tournaments, registration can be canceled up to one minute before the scheduled start time. Tickets won in satellites do not allow for registration cancellations.
1.12. A LIGA SUPREMA POKER poderá altera: 1.12. The SUPREME POKER UNION may change registration or cancellation times without prior notice.
2.1. O torneio termina quando um jogador: 2.1. The tournament concludes when a player accumulates all the chips in play or when all remaining players receive the same prize – for instance, if the tournament awards 5 identical prizes, it may conclude when only 5 players remain.
2.2. Caso dois ou mais jogadores sejam e: 2.2. In the event that two or more players are eliminated in the same hand, the player with more chips at the beginning of the hand finishes in a higher position than the player with fewer chips. If all players started the hand with an identical amount of chips, they will all finish tied, and any prizes will be distributed equally among them.
2.2.1. Durante a disputa hand for hand,: 2.2.1. During the hand-for-hand play, two or more players eliminated during a single synchronized hand will be treated as if they were eliminated simultaneously, even if they are at different tables. The final placement order will be based on a comparison of stack sizes.
2.3. Quando restar apenas um jogador par: 2.3. When only one player remains to be eliminated to reach the prize range, the tournament will be played hand for hand. This means that if one table completes its hand before the other table(s), it must wait for the other(s) to finish before playing the next hand.
2.4. Quando restarem dois jogadores em u: 2.4. When two players remain at a final table, the button places the small blind and acts first in the opening round.
2.5. Conforme os jogadores forem sendo e: 2.5. As players are eliminated from the tournament, the software will break tables to fill empty seats, ensuring that all tables have a balanced number of active players.
3.1. Ao participar de um torneio, o joga: 3.1. By participating in a tournament, the player acknowledges the risk of connection drop and/or lack of internet connection due to issues and/or instabilities between their device (phone/computer) and the servers, lag, freezes, among other scenarios over which SUPREMA POKER UNION has no control
3.2. O jogador isenta a LIGA SUPREMA POK: 3.2. The player releases SUPREMA POKER UNION from any liability arising from internet connection problems.
3.3. Caso um jogador esgote seu tempo du: 3.3. If a player runs out of time during a hand, whether connected to the game or not, it will be considered a fold if there is action by the player, or the hand will be passed if there is no action by the player.
3.4. Caso um jogador não esteja conectad: 3.4. If a player is not connected before the start of a hand, they will receive cards as usual. For negotiations, players must be sitting out.
4.1. Os jogadores não poderão discutir a: 4.1. Players may not discuss the hand or their cards until the action is complete, even if they are not participating in the hand. Players are required to protect other tournament participants at all times. Discussing discarded cards or potential hands is not allowed. Any violation in this regard will result in penalties being applied.
4.2. O jogador está proibido de publicar: 4.2. The player is prohibited from posting illegal, obscene, accusatory, defamatory, threatening, indecent, racist, or any material that constitutes a violation of the law or may be considered offensive in general through the chat function within the Service.
5.1. O Poker é um jogo individual, e não: 5.1. Poker is an individual game, not a team sport. Any action or communication between players, even with the intent to assist, will be deemed unethical and prohibited.
5.2. São consideradas violações às regra: 5.2. Violations of fair play rules include softplay (playing in a way that facilitates the game for another opponent), chip dumping (intentional loss of chips to another player), collusion (joint action by players in a specific hand to gain an unfair advantage), among other scenarios. The identification of such practices will result in penalties, including the confiscation of player account funds, account closure, fines, and withholding of any available rakeback offers.
5.3. Nós rotineiramente revisamos os jog: 5.3. We routinely review games to ensure the integrity of our tournaments and uphold ethical standards and fair play rules, combating any attempts to violate these rules. Therefore, in some cases, it may be necessary to withhold player winnings until the investigative process is concluded.
5.4. A utilização de inteligência artifi: 5.4. The use of artificial intelligence (BOT) is strictly prohibited in tournaments and games of SUPREMA POKER UNION. All actions by a player within SUPREMA POKER UNION must be personally executed by the player through the user interface accessible by using the system and without the assistance of any type of automation.
5.5. Qualquer jogador que suspeitar da o: 5.5. Any player suspecting the occurrence of any practice contrary to fair play rules may report it through the website www.securitypkr.com.br.
6.1. A violação de qualquer critério das: 6.1. Violation of any criteria within the Fair Play and Ethics in the Game Rules will result in the application of penalties at the exclusive discretion of SUPREMA POKER UNION, without prejudice to the adoption of other legal measures deemed relevant.
6.2. Durante o processo de investigação,: 6.2. During the investigation process, SUPREMA POKER UNION may temporarily suspend the account of the investigated player(s) and withhold any funds deposited in their account(s) and/or prize(s).
6.3. As penalidades que poderão ser apli: 6.3. Penalties that may be applied to players who violate the Fair Play and Ethics in the Game Rules include warnings, withholding and blocking of balances (tournament prizes and account balances), temporary or permanent suspension of the user, withholding of any available rakeback offers, and the imposition of fines.
7.1. Cada Conta é acessível através da c: 7.1. Each account is accessible through a unique combination of a username and a secret password.
7.2. O jogador é obrigado a escolher o s: 7.2. The player is required to choose their own Username and Password, generating a Unique Identifier (ID).

7.4. O jogador é obrigado a manter perma: 7.4. The player is obligated to keep their Access Data permanently secret and confidential, making all efforts to protect their confidentiality. Any unauthorized use of their Access Data is solely the player's responsibility and will be considered as their personal use. Any liability arising from this will be attributed to the player.
Qualquer dúvida que você tiver sobre ess: For any questions you may have about these rules, please contact
O pote deve ser igual ou maior que 20bb': The pot must be equal to or greater than 20 bb’s. Four players must agree pre-flop. In the event of an agreement during the hand, only the first one will count.
Jogadores perdedores devem ter uma mão m: Losing players must have a minimum qualifying hand. Both players must use two cards from their hand.
Se mais de um jogador perder com uma mão: If more than one player loses with a hand qualifying for the Cooler Jackpot prize, the prize will be divided proportionally.
As mãos classificatórias mínimas devem s: The minimum qualifying hands must be beaten by Quads or a higher hand.
Qualificação mínima: - Derrotado de ter: Minimum Qualification: - Defeated by having a Full House of Aces with Tens or better
(As cartas devem consistir em pelo menos: (Cards must include at least one Ace in the hand)
Qualificação mínima: - Quadra de Dez ou: Minimum Qualification: - Quads of Tens or better
(Quadras devem consistir em um par na mã: (Quads must consist of a pair in the hand)
Qualificação mínima: - Quadra de Ases ou: Minimum Qualification: - Quads of Aces or better
Qualificação mínima: - Nove High Straigh: Minimum Qualification: - Defeated by a Nine High Straight Flush or better
